short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Noted Analytics Google Calendar Extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Updating Salesforce fields is the worst.  Noted feels like a Google Doc.  

With this chrome extension, you’ll be able to:
Launch Noted from your Google Calendar
Automatically link to the correct Account & Opportunity 
See blindspots on what information needs to be captured in this meeting
Update Salesforce fields 

However you want to work, it’s Noted.

Whether that means you typing, taking handwritten, or even speaking your notes.

It’s time for you to be able to work like… you!

Learn more at notedanalytics.com
Find us on the Apple iOS AppStore and Google Play.
